posts.text:
“Donald Trump now has the power to pardon Ghislaine Maxwell and release her from prison. That’s what he’s going to do in exchange for her insisting he knew nothing about Epstein’s raping of children. He will claim she was just a scapegoat. And that’s a lie.”

Lawrence O’Donnell
5 August 2025

#Trump

posts.text:
In a parliamentary meeting, MP Farid Bustani discussed challenges with private electricity generators and proposed solutions. A consumer protection law and a public competition law are set for approval. Increased monitoring of generator compliance was emphasized. 

#Lebanon #Economy #Energy

posts.text:
FBI Staff: "Where do I put these #Epstein Files?"

Trump Staff: "Are those #Epstein Files associated with #Trump?"

FBI Staff: "Yes"

Trump Staff: "Put them down here with the rest of them"

FBI Staff: "You're going to need a bigger shredder, there are thousands more!"

posts.text:
Alcuni giorni fa #Trump è andato a giocare a golf in #Scozia. Ha passato il tempo a parlare male delle #paleeoliche (che lui odia e che si vedevano in lontananza dal campo di gioco).
Trump è un negazionista del surriscaldamento globale e un convinto sostenitore dell’industria petrolifera.
continua⬇️
